mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT sj, to_char(rgsde,'yyyy-mm-dd mm:mi') as rgsde, co, cn FROM NOTICE WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (no, sj, cn) VALUES (seq_qna_no.nextval, #{sj}, #{cn})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET sj = #{sj}, cn = #{cn}, rgsde = sysdate WHERE no = #{no}
UPDATE notice SET co = co + 1 WHERE no = #{no}
